name: Invasion X
description:
Alpha Version

Are you ready to save the galaxy from evil invaders? Invasion X is a classic top-down shooter. It's super alpha, so feel free to leave comments on what you like (or what you don't!)

Playing the Game

  • Use the arrow keys to move your ship.
  • Space bar fires weapons or selects an option.
  • p will pause the game.
  • q will go back to the main title.

Basic game pad support is available. Feel free to pair your PS4, 8-bit do, or other favorite controller and have at it! (If you run into any issues, be sure to leave a comment.)
